Texts.Chs: ^#71f2f6;按F键可使用^orange;变形球技术II^white;在狭缝与宽敞处来去自如。如果你被挡住了，按下^orange;[左键]^reset;释放炸弹炸毁障碍物。
Texts.Eng: ^#71f2f6;Press F to make use of the ^orange;Distortion Sphere Tech II^white; to transform in and out of a compressed form. If you're blocked, press ^orange;[Fire]^reset; to blow up obstacles with a bomb.
